item.description:
This is a Fundraiser for the NonProfit that supports historic preservation in Nahant. A couple of us are going to walk the race (runners also welcome of course!) and relax/recuperate together afterwards in the area (Mia's house or the beach, depending on weather and our mood). 

Entries for the race must be postmarked no later than Wed, Sept 21 for early registration of $20. Online entry: go to active.com, enter Sea to Shining Sea in the search bar to find it.

Or send a check made out to Nahant Preservation Trust along with your:

name, address, telephone, gender and age (for race category placement) and shirt size to:

Sea to Shining Sea
c/o Roz
21 Greystone Road
Nahant, MA 01908

Race Day registration: $25

Free raffle ticket to all entrants for numerous prizes. You must be present to win. Refreshments /lunch of hot dogs, hamburgers will be served.

Long sleeve tee shirts free to the 1st 150 entrants.

Medals to top 3 winners in each category, male & female (categories span ages 18 and under to 70+).

Let us know if you are coming and we'll look for you and send our cell #s so we can locate one another.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact us via cell phone before the race if we don't meet up - we'll send # to those who are signed up.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: 7th Annual Sea to Shining Sea 5-mile (walk or run) Road Race / FYI event
